results.name: Square array A(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where column k is the expansion of 1/sqrt(1 - 2*x + (1-4*k^2)*x^2).
formula: A(n,k) is the constant term in the expansion of (k/x + 1 + k*x)^n.
A(n,k) is the coefficient of x^n in the expansion of (1 + x + (k*x)^2)^n.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Sum[If[k == j == 0, 1, k^(2*j)] * Binomial[n, 2*j] * Binomial[2*j, j], {j, 0, Floor[n/2]}]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 13 2021 *)
